summary: Comprehensive testing completed for FlowTask Pro AI-powered task manager. All major functionality working correctly including backend APIs, frontend UI interactions, AI assistant, mobile responsiveness, and integration between components.

fixed_issues.issue: POST endpoint returned status 200 instead of 201

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and root endpoint
Task CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Task filtering by date and priority
AI chat functionality with Gemini 3 Flash
Task Manager navigation and form submission
AI Assistant chat interface and messaging
